quote_a: I mainly use AI for quick corrections and rephrasing sentences for administrative email communications.
quote_b: what would interest me is that it is directly connected, at least in my professional case, directly to our data and that it provides more precision. Because, at present, I give it a lot of context with variables, and it is not capable, at least with us, of retrieving these variables and therefore performing an analysis, for example.
explanation: The participant frames their AI use as mainly limited to email corrections, but then describes actively attempting to use AI for complex data variable retrieval and analysis, revealing a broader and more ambitious engagement than the narrow framing suggests.
